file_content.text: You've kept that ship pretty well.
Get the power couplings hooked up, and see what we can do about that exhaust signature.
Yes, sir.
Hey, Cipher--meet what's left of Intelligence.
Kind of sad, huh? These guys can't even play a decent game of sabacc.
You clean them out yet, or did they realize you cheat?
Glad to see you're having fun.
Cheating's the point. Hell, it's good to see you.
Kaliyo... you're okay!
After Lord Razer took you, I didn't know what happened.
And you were worried about me? Aw. It's good to see you, agent.
It's been a while. I was starting to wonder....
You had me worried!
You thought I'd slipped off to Nar Shaddaa without you.
We're glad you're alright, but how?
How did you end up here?
Dare I ask how you found yourself aboard this ship?
You should be dead.
I don't like being in the dark. She's supposed to be in prison somewhere.
Someone had better explain.
I'm supposed to be in a lot of prisons. It's good to see you, too.
Your old bosses set up the escape. I've been running jobs for them--pay's bad, but I wanted my crack at the scum who messed with us.
The Minister of Intelligence suggested using her. He was right--she's very good.
Sounds like you've been busy. The Minister planned all this?
Bring me up to speed.
It's almost like old times. Is the Minister here, too?
All of us together again....
Yes, he--um.
It's been much too long. Last time I saw you, you almost died.
We're finally together.
We've both--been through changes.
A brighter agent would've moved on to better--um.
You are not prepared for stressful conversations. I will prepare another dosage.
I'll focus on the work.
You couldn't have mentioned any of this on Corellia?
You should've told me.
You didn't need to know. Security was--um.
You should not be moving. I will prepare a fresh dosage.
The Minister brought us together after Intelligence was dissolved. He accelerated my treatments and recruited a core of loyal operatives.
We're working to find the Star Cabal's base of operations. He'll explain the rest in the conference room.
In that case, I suppose we'd better talk. Coming along?
Understood.
I need to prepare for the mission. But I'll speak to you soon.
You're not recovered yet, are you? The droid....
Are you okay?
I am the mistress's medical assistant. Her neurochemical levels will require regulation within twenty minutes.
Twenty-three minutes. I can still do basic math.
I'm sorry, I'm fine. I just need more rest than usual.
If I can help in any way....
Is there anything I can do?
What will help is eliminating the Star Cabal, along with every trace of their existence.
I believe you can do that for me.
If you say you're fine, I believe you. I'll go talk to the Minister.
Of course.
Thank you.
And Cipher? I'm glad you're with us.
If you can't perform, you're a danger to the mission.
You're no good to us unfit.
I can perform, and you don't have anyone else. The Minister is waiting.
We're working without sanction, aren't we?
This is an illegal operation.
I can't--I'm sorry, I can't think about that. I was bred for loyalty, and....
Her mind is not at full capacity. Please refrain from taxing it.
I'm sorry. Hurt the people who did this to me.
Glad to have you here.
